group_1.textRight: Do you know about the Chocolate of Fate,@Madoka?

group_1.textLeft: Chocolate of...Fate?

group_1.textRight: Yes! There's a rumor going around all the@schools.
They say there's a secret sweets store@that randomly appears in Kamihama.
And that you can buy chocolate there that@has your fate copied onto it!

group_1.textLeft: My fate? Like fortune telling?
Is it chocolate for Valentine's Day?

group_1.textRight: The rumor says you can exchange your@Chocolate of Fate with someone else...
...or just give the whole thing away.
I heard it's also perfect for Valentine's @Day.
Some people claim their lives changed@drastically because of it.

group_1.textLeft: Really?

group_1.textRight: And that's not all! This came in the mail@the other day!
"Chocolate of Fate On Sale!@The low, low price of 500 yen!"

group_1.textLeft: [chara:200150:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Th-they send out flyers?!
That's a bit too much. I'm kinda suspicious@now.

group_1.textRight: Same here... It's just common sense to@think this a prank.
But I'd like to check it out just in case!
It won't take long, I promise! We could go@while we're out shopping...
I'd really like for us to go there and take@a quick look!
And if they're suspicious looking, then...
...we'll just transform someplace quiet@and kick their butts!

group_1.textLeft: (Note to self: Kako might actually be pretty @fierce...)
The map on the flyer says it should be@around here somewhere.
But I don't see a single store anywhere.@This is just getting more suspicious...

group_1.textRight: Oh! It's that building there.

group_1.textLeft: The store name's a match, too.@Chocolat...Shop?

group_1.textRight: That's the French spelling of "chocolate".
It's like a maze in here. Not exactly what@you expect inside a store.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, this is really strange.
Could it be an elaborate prank?

group_1.textRight: I suppose...
I'm sorry, this is taking much longer than @I thought it would...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, don't worry about that!
I was really curious about this. It would've@bothered me if I didn't check it out.
It's fun, even! It's like we're lost in a@treasure maze!

group_1.textRight: Madoka, what would you do if the@Chocolate of Fate were real?

group_1.textLeft: Well...
I can't think who I'd give it to, but...
...I do check my fortune often.
And I guess I am a bit curious how my fate@has been turning out!
What about you? Would you give it to@someone?

group_1.textRight: No, there's no one for me to give it to yet.
But, I wonder about my fate too.
Don't you think that, if there really were@chocolate with your fate on it...
...and you broke it to smithereens, you@might be able to become a new you?
I've been thinking about how I became@a Magical Girl...
I think I've managed to change, but only @a little.
Maybe I should be trying harder.

group_1.textLeft: I think you're fine the way you are, Kako.

group_1.textRight: I've been...seeing the same dream recently.
In it, I'm a Magical Girl, but a monster @emerges from my body, and it's not me.
It destroys not only my precious books, but@everything else.
In my dream, it tears up everything and leaves@it in shambles...
But...
I wasn't sad...even though I should be.@In fact I felt something much worse.
If I don't change...
What if one day...
...I actually become like that?
That's why I have to take my fate into my@own hands.
I guess you could say I'm being@superstitious...
It's just a dream, but it's scaring me@so much.
Do you think it's weird?

group_1.textLeft: Of course not. It's not weird at all.
Actually, I also have dreams where I become@some kind of monster.
I have them often, too...
Who knows? Maybe some day, unexpectedly...
I might lose myself and become it.
It scares me, too.
So, I get you.
But anyway!
If the Chocolate of Fate really exists,@I'm taking it.
Then I'll melt it all up and make it@bite-sized for all my friends!
